name: Quest for the Spirit Sphere!
description:
While dodging chores at his secret hideout Mark finds something magical. A cute little newborn spirit named Heart! The two become fast friends, except there's one problem: the Locke Family owns all spirit spheres that form on their property and they plan to sell her like all the rest of them. Can Mark find her before she gets sold?

I made this game for the  NaNoRenO 2019 jam, which I was unfortunately four days late for.  ^^
Quest for the Spirit Sphere is a kinetic visual novel, which means there are no choices.  Just think of it as a semi-animated short story with music.  ^^

Length is approximately 45 minutes.

Enjoy!  ^^
